titles.title: Hospital Billing Fairness Act of 2004
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require fair billing for hospital services provided to uninsured patients as a condition of Medicaid funding for a hospital.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 3/31/2004--Introduced. Hospital Billing Fairness Act of 2004 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require fair billing for hospital services provided to uninsured patients as a condition of Medicaid funding for a hospital.
